page.title: 20The Queen's Visit to S.on A.
page.content:
Customs.On June 1st 1985 the Queen had lunch at the Welcombe Hotel before attending the wedding of Melissa Owen and Michael-John Knatchbull,grandson of the late Earl Mountbatten,at St. Mary's Church,Warwick.The Queen had flown to Coventry and then travelled by car to Stratford to be the guest of the Bridegroom's parents Countess Mountbatten and Lord Brabourne.The Queen wore a light blue striped dress and a matching hat.Other royal visitors to the wedding and reception were Princess Anne,Lord Linley and Lady Sarah Armstrong-Jones.Prince Charles attended the reception at Shire Hall.
These reports and the Survey were completed by staff and children of The Willows Church of England Junior and Infant School, Stratford upon Avon.
